page.title: 03BROWNIES AND CUBS
page.content: The Brownies and Cubs are girls and boys who meet on special days and who wear uniforms. Brownies meet on Mondays from 18.00 to 19.30. Sometimes they go on pack holidays but only once a year. When you get to Brownies in the evening, you sing the Brownies song. Sometimes you have a sing_song. Then you play games like "Baked Beans" and "Fishes in the Net". Rounders is one of the Brownies' well liked team games. Cubs meet on Thursdays from 18.30 to 20.00. They meet in North Curry village hall. The minimum age for joining Brownies and Cubs is 7 years. You leave Brownies at the age of 10 and Cubs at the age of 11. Then you can go on to join the Guides or the Scouts.
